Myles Turner recorded 17 points and 10 rebounds, while Tyrese Haliburton contributed 17 points and five assists.
Key Match Events: The Pacers responded with a 15-3 run after the Magic took a lead.

Others: The game was played at Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis.
